alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:01PM EST until January 11 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From Monday morning to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by late Monday morning and continue to a crest of 18.8 feet by late Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage by early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Monday.
